item.title: Microsoft Is Adding Anthropic’s Claude to Its AI Tools. Here’s What It Can Do For Businesses
item.description: After investing over $10 billion in OpenAI, Microsoft is harnessing Anthropic’s AI now, too.

item.title: Peter Thiel Compared Tech Detractors to the Antichrist, Says a Lecture Attendee
item.description: An attendee of the billionaire investor’s secretive Antichrist lecture series reveals new details from Thiel’s latest talk.

item.title: The Force 5: Leading through Resistance
item.description: Not everyone is going to see your vision as quickly as you do, and that’s okay.

item.title: 7 Smart Ways to Leverage Interim Leadership
item.description: It isn’t just for the C-suite—or for emergencies.

item.title: How AI ‘Workslop’ Will Hurt Your Profits
item.description: The padded content, outright mistakes and misdirected results of low-quality AI outputs take time and money to fix.
